flexpy.LexEntry module¶

class flexpy.LexEntry.LexEntry(rt, tag_dict)¶

Bases: object

A FlexPy-specific class (i.e., not from FLEx’s XML structure) intended to make it easier to work with lexeme entries

Parameters
